original_title: Electricity, Petroleum, Postal, Health services declared as essential service
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); President Ranil Wickremesinghe has issued an extraordinary gazette declaring the following the services as essential services.
2. The supply or distribution of petroleum products and fuel

4. All service, work or labour, of any description whatsoever, necessary or required to be done in connection with the maintenance, and the reception, care feeding, and treatment, of patients in hospitals, nursing homes, dispensaries, and other similar institutions.
